item.title: dmenu
item.description: Dmenu documentation. Manual installation DEPRECATED: git clone https://github.com/a2n-s/dmenu ~/repos/dmenu cd ~/repos/dmenu git checkout main make clean install One can change the colorscheme by editing the config.h file and changing the #include "colors/<theme>.h" line. One can also refer to the GitHub repo. -------------------------------------------------------------------- Go back to the doc or the front page.
item.content:
Dmenu documentation.

Manual installation DEPRECATED:

git clone https://github.com/a2n-s/dmenu ~/repos/dmenu
cd ~/repos/dmenu
git checkout main
make clean install

One can change the colorscheme by editing the config.h file and changing the #include "colors/<theme>.h" line.
One can also refer to the GitHub repo.

--------------------------------------------------------------------

Go back to the doc or the front page.
